title: Sing and be happy with Jane Pickens
brief_description: A musical sing-along with Jane Pickens (with audience participation and bouncing ball). Songs include: ‘I’ll be walking with my honey’, ‘I never knew’, and ‘I’ll see you in my dreams’.
